nodes.text: Gloamer was a male Phindian who worked as a speeder mechanic at Dannar's Claim in the Pika Oasis, on Tatooine. Gloamer ran a vibrant trade and took up the third largest portion of the garages in Dannar's Claim. Gloamer had several assistants that worked with him, including his lead assistant, a Vuvrian. Gloamer also worked on the two other parts of the garages, the Settlers' Call Fund vehicle garage and Orrin Gault's moisture vaporator fleet. Around 19 BBY, Gloamer was working on an USV-5 landspeeder and considered it the best speeder in the Pika Oasis.
